title: Singles-plus combat

properties.value: Singles-plus combat area is an area of the RuneScape world similar to single-way combat, with the exception that if a player is in combat with a monster, they can be attacked by another player. content:
Singles-plus combat area is an area of the RuneScape world similar to single-way combat, with the exception that if a player is in combat with a monster, they can be attacked by another player. Currently, only the Revenant Caves are singles-plus. Singles-plus combat areas are identified by an icon of a single sword and a plus icon which appears in the bottom-right corner of the game window (on fixed mode) or under the minimap (on resizable mode).

This mechanic also applies when fighting Zamorak wizards in the wilderness, although players can still attack the wizard even if they are being attacked by another player.
